name: Butter Chicken
description: Grilled chicken simmered in a spicy, aromatic, buttery, and creamy tomato gravy.

name: Paneer Tikka Masala
description: Marinated paneer cheese served in a spiced gravy.

name: Chole Bhature
description: A combination of spicy chickpeas (chole) and fried bread called bhature.

name: Biryani (Chicken)
description: A mixed rice dish originating among the Muslims of the Indian subcontinent. Made with Indian spices, rice, and meat (chicken).

name: Masala Dosa
description: A South Indian dish consisting of a thin pancake or crepe made from fermented batter, stuffed with potatoes, onions, and spices.

name: Samosa
description: A fried or baked pastry with a savory filling, such as spiced potatoes, onions, peas, or lentils.

name: Bibimbap
description: A Korean rice dish topped with assorted vegetables, meat, a fried egg, and gochujang (chili pepper paste).

name: Kimchi Jjigae
description: A spicy Korean stew made with kimchi and other ingredients, such as pork, seafood, scallions, onions, and diced tofu.

name: Bulgogi
description: Thinly sliced, marinated beef grilled on a barbecue or stove-top griddle.

name: Tteokbokki
description: Stir-fried rice cakes in a spicy gochujang sauce, often with fish cakes and boiled eggs.

name: Japchae
description: Sweet potato starch noodles stir-fried with vegetables and meat.

name: Korean Fried Chicken
description: Double-fried chicken wings coated in a sweet and spicy sauce or soy garlic sauce.

name: Kung Pao Chicken
description: Spicy stir-fried chicken with peanuts, vegetables, and chili peppers.

name: Mapo Tofu
description: Soft tofu set in a spicy sauce, typically thin, oily, and bright red, based on douban (fermented broad bean and chili paste) and douchi (fermented black beans), along with minced meat.

name: Sweet and Sour Pork
description: Deep-fried pork pieces tossed in a classic sweet and sour sauce with pineapple and bell peppers.

name: Dumplings (Jiaozi)
description: Thin pieces of dough wrapped around a filling, usually steamed, boiled, or fried. Fillings vary from pork, shrimp, chicken to vegetables.

name: Spring Rolls
description: Crispy fried rolls filled with vegetables or meat.

name: Chow Mein
description: Stir-fried noodles with vegetables, and often meat or tofu.

name: Margherita Pizza
description: Classic pizza topped with San Marzano tomatoes, mozzarella cheese, fresh basil, salt, and extra-virgin olive oil.

name: Lasagna Bolognese
description: Layers of flat pasta baked with alternating layers of Bolognese sauce, b√©chamel sauce, and Parmesan cheese.

name: Spaghetti Carbonara
description: Pasta dish made with eggs, hard cheese (Pecorino Romano or Parmigiano-Reggiano), cured pork (guanciale or pancetta), and black pepper.

name: Risotto ai Funghi
description: Creamy Italian rice dish cooked with broth until it reaches a creamy consistency, flavored with mushrooms.

name: Fettuccine Alfredo
description: Flat pasta tossed with butter and Parmesan cheese. Often served with chicken or shrimp.

name: Caprese Salad
description: Simple Italian salad, made of sliced fresh mozzarella, tomatoes, and sweet basil, seasoned with salt and olive oil.

name: Chocolate Lava Cake
description: A decadent chocolate cake with a gooey molten chocolate center.

name: Tiramisu
description: Classic Italian dessert made with layers of coffee-soaked ladyfingers and mascarpone cheese, dusted with cocoa powder.

name: Cheesecake (New York Style)
description: Rich and dense cheesecake with a graham cracker crust.

name: Apple Pie
description: Classic American dessert with a flaky crust filled with spiced apples.

name: Gulab Jamun
description: Indian dessert made from milk solids, deep-fried and soaked in sugar syrup.

name: Brownie with Ice Cream
description: Warm chocolate brownie served with a scoop of vanilla ice cream.

name: Classic Vanilla Milkshake
description: Creamy milkshake made with vanilla ice cream and milk.

name: Chocolate Milkshake
description: Rich chocolate milkshake made with chocolate ice cream and milk.

name: Strawberry Milkshake
description: Sweet milkshake made with strawberry ice cream and milk.

name: Oreo Milkshake
description: Milkshake blended with Oreo cookies for a cookies and cream flavor.

name: Mango Milkshake
description: Refreshing milkshake made with fresh mangoes or mango pulp.

name: Peanut Butter Milkshake
description: Creamy milkshake with the nutty flavor of peanut butter.

name: Coca-Cola
description: Classic carbonated soft drink.

name: Pepsi
description: Popular cola soft drink.

name: Sprite
description: Lemon-lime flavored carbonated soft drink.

name: Fanta (Orange)
description: Orange-flavored carbonated soft drink.

name: Mango Lassi
description: Traditional Indian yogurt-based drink blended with mango.

name: Iced Tea (Lemon)
description: Chilled tea flavored with lemon.
